ComicInfo.Title: Homelands Chapter Two: The Saint George Syndrome
ComicInfo.Summary: Homelands Chapter Two: The Saint George Syndrome: As the Black Knight continues his journeys towards the Emperor, he eliminates a dragon and three fabled knights. The Emperorâ€™s administrators know the Knight is journeying towards him, but cannot find him, due to his witching cloak.
